item.description:
After a leisure walk along the beautiful Cape Cod Canal we're off to Cartwheels2 for a go cart ride and to have a blast on the bumper boats! By then, we'll be ready for lunch at a casual Cape Cod Restaurant.

Meet 9:00 am in Milford to carpool (location to be determined)

Approximate Times
10:30 am - 11:30 am Walk the Cape Cod Canal (cost $0)
11:30 am - 12:30 pm Go Carts and Bumper Boats ($6 each) Optional - Feel free to relax if you do not want to participate.
12:30 pm - 2:30 pm Lunch on the Harbor in Cataumet at the Chart Room
3:00 pm/3:30 pm head home - return to Milford by 5 pm
item.how_to_find_us: Go over bridge, take right then first right. Follow to Cape Cod Canal entrance on left. Call Jacki 508-381-1529
item.name: Fun Day at the Cape
